# Science, Engineering, and Math Lessons

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/science-engineering-and-math-lesson-plans-in-fortnite-creative
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-26T23:56:59.976207

---

Your students can build an escape room, or a Rube Goldberg device, or more! These lessons are designed for your classroom as standalone lessons, or as part of a larger subject within science, engineering, and mathematics.

[![Collision Decision](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/bdf867c7-9187-4732-a961-e6f31472a9a8?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

Collision Decision

Students can study the laws of physics using colliding objects in Fortnite Creative.](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/collision-decision-lesson-plan-in-fortnite-creative)[![Create an Escape Room](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/e35279f1-f571-4a7b-8a5e-678734d406ea?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

Create an Escape Room

Students can use the Fortnite Creative toolset to create visually stunning environments for learning core subjects.](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/escape-room-lesson-plan-for-fortnite-creative)[![Rube Goldberg Machines](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/8ab0fadc-3f87-40e8-a75f-cc2edcdab639?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

Rube Goldberg Machines

Students learn physics and engineering by building a Rube Goldberg Machine in Fortnite Creative.](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/rube-goldberg-machine-lesson-plan-in-fortnite-creative)[![The Scientific Method with Fortnite](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/35546760-6609-42eb-9112-0091fee0a903?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

The Scientific Method with Fortnite

Students use objects in Fortnite Creative to determine if they react to gravity and the laws of physics like real objects.](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/scientific-method-lesson-plan-in-fortnite-creative)[![Theme Park of the Future](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/ae04c7e0-f4de-44a9-ab8e-d06346f82222?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

Theme Park of the Future

Students build a rollercoaster in Fortnite Creative to explore gravity, momentum, and other principles of physics.](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/theme-park-lesson-plan-in-fortnite-creative)
